title: Disaggregated counts of use of force in four facilities

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records that contain *counts* of Use of Force in February 2023, disaggregated by 
a) date of incident or report, 
b) type of equipment involved in the incident (e.g. OC, 40mm projectiles), and 
c) facility

for the following facilities: 

California Medical Facility (CMF)
Central California Women’s Facility (CCWF)
High Desert State Prison (HDSP)
North Kern State Prison (NKSP)

If you would like to discuss this request, please feel free to reach out to me, John Lindsay-Poland, American Friends Service Committee, at 510-282-8983.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

John Lindsay-Poland

title: Request for various CDCR forms and instructions

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. A copy of the form used to compile data for Compstat reports posted by CDCR (not filled in)
2. Records with instructions that guide personnel in the compilation of CDCR Compstat reports, or in the generation of data used to compile Compstat reports
3. A copy of CDCR 837 Crime/Incident Report Forms (not filled in)
4. A copy of CDCR Form 3010 Incident Commander's Review/Critique Use of Force Incidents (not filled in)
5. A copy of the fields or form used in the Incident Report Tracking (IRT) system (not filled in)
6. A copy of CDCR form 7219, Medical Report of Injury or Unusual Occurrence (not filled in)
7. A copy of CDCR Form 3014, Report of Findings-Inmate Interview (not filled in)
8. A copy of CDCR Form 602, Inmate Appeal (not filled in)

If you would like to discuss this request, please feel free to reach out to me, John Lindsay-Poland, American Friends Service Committee, at 510-282-8983.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

John Lindsay-Poland
